oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Overton Park Japanese Garden with Pond
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Japanese Garden, Overton Park, Memphis, Tenn." Color image of garden with lily pond at the forefront.

"Like a corner of the Orient dropped down into the midst of the Occident, the Japanese Garden with its lily pond at Overton Park, is a vivid splotch of color. It is as fragrant as it is lovely. Children and grown-ups like to gather here to watch the water-fowl disport themselves. -- gift of Mrs. Nell Gaffney"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Overton Park; parks; gardens;
